title: Homeward bound
creator_credit: Duwayne Dunham, Richard Prince, Franklin R. Levy, Jeffrey Chernov and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: Family oriented children’s themed adventure comedy, about three domestic pets making their way across rugged country, back to their beloved owners. Their many misadventures embrace the themes of friendship, co-operation and familial love. Cast and voice cast includes Robert Hays, Kim Greist, Jean Smart, Michael J. Fox, Benji Thall, Veronica Lauren, Don Ameche and Sally Field.
